description: Lists available reserved cache node offerings.

parameters.name: ReservedCacheNodesOfferingId
parameters.description: The offering identifier filter value. Use this parameter to show only the available offering that matches the specified reservation identifier. Example: 438012d3-4052-4cc7-b2e3-8d3372e0e706

parameters.name: CacheNodeType
parameters.description: The cache node type filter value. Use this parameter to show only the available offerings matching the specified cache node type. The following node types are supported by ElastiCache. Generally speaking, the current generation types provide more memory and computational power at lower cost when compared to their equivalent previous generation counterparts. General purpose: Current generation: M7g node types: cache.m7g.large, cache.m7g.xlarge, cache.m7g.2xlarge, cache.m7g.4xlarge, cache.m7g.8xlarge, cache.m7g.12xlarge, cache.m7g.16xlarge Previous generation: (not recommended. Existing clusters are still supported but creation of new clusters is not supported for these types.) T1 node types: cache.t1.micro M1 node types: cache.m1.small, cache.m1.medium, cache.m1.large, cache.m1.xlarge M3 node types: cache.m3.medium, cache.m3.large, cache.m3.xlarge, cache.m3.2xlarge Compute optimized: Previous generation: (not recommended. Existing clusters are still supported but creation of new clusters is not supported for these types.) C1 node types: cache.c1.xlarge Memory optimized: Current generation: R7g node types: cache.r7g.large, cache.r7g.xlarge, cache.r7g.2xlarge, cache.r7g.4xlarge, cache.r7g.8xlarge, cache.r7g.12xlarge, cache.r7g.16xlarge Previous generation: (not recommended. Existing clusters are still supported but creation of new clusters is not supported for these types.) M2 node types: cache.m2.xlarge, cache.m2.2xlarge, cache.m2.4xlarge R3 node types: cache.r3.large, cache.r3.xlarge, cache.r3.2xlarge, cache.r3.4xlarge, cache.r3.8xlarge All current generation instance types are created in Amazon VPC by default. Valkey or Redis OSS append-only files (AOF) are not supported for T1 or T2 instances. Valkey or Redis OSS Multi-AZ with automatic failover is not supported on T1 instances. The configuration variables appendonly and appendfsync are not supported on Valkey, or on Redis OSS version 2.8.22 and later.

parameters.name: Duration
parameters.description: Duration filter value, specified in years or seconds. Use this parameter to show only reservations for a given duration. Valid Values: 1 | 3 | 31536000 | 94608000

parameters.name: OfferingType
parameters.description: The offering type filter value. Use this parameter to show only the available offerings matching the specified offering type. Valid Values: "Light Utilization"|"Medium Utilization"|"Heavy Utilization" |"All Upfront"|"Partial Upfront"| "No Upfront"

parameters.name: MaxRecords
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to include in the response. If more records exist than the specified MaxRecords value, a marker is included in the response so that the remaining results can be retrieved. Default: 100 Constraints: minimum 20; maximum 100.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: Provides an identifier to allow retrieval of paginated results.

nested_items.name: ReservedCacheNodesOfferings
nested_items.description: A list of reserved cache node offerings. Each element in the list contains detailed information about one offering.

nested_items.name: ReservedCacheNodesOfferingId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the reserved cache node offering.

nested_items.name: CacheNodeType
nested_items.description: The cache node type for the reserved cache node.

nested_items.name: M7g node types
nested_items.type: not recommended. Existing clusters are still supported but creation of new clusters is not supported for these types.

nested_items.name: C1 node types:
nested_items.type: not recommended. Existing clusters are still supported but creation of new clusters is not supported for these types.

nested_items.name: C1 node types:
nested_items.type: not recommended. Existing clusters are still supported but creation of new clusters is not supported for these types.

nested_items.name: R7g node types
nested_items.type: not recommended. Existing clusters are still supported but creation of new clusters is not supported for these types.

nested_items.name: Duration
nested_items.description: The duration of the offering. in seconds.

nested_items.name: FixedPrice
nested_items.description: The fixed price charged for this offering.

nested_items.name: UsagePrice
nested_items.description: The hourly price charged for this offering.

nested_items.name: ProductDescription
nested_items.description: The cache engine used by the offering.

nested_items.name: RecurringCharges
nested_items.description: The recurring price charged to run this reserved cache node.

nested_items.name: RecurringChargeAmount
nested_items.description: The monetary amount of the recurring charge.

nested_items.name: RecurringChargeFrequency
nested_items.description: The frequency of the recurring charge.
